1126100.name: WELCOME
1126100.description:
*****NOTE*****
THE GAME IS STILL UNDER DEVELOPMENT AND IT DOES NOT REPRESENT THE FINAL VERSION OF THE GAME. THERE IS STILL A LOT TO IMPROVE SO IF YOU WANT THE FULL EXPERIENCE OF THIS GAME PLEASE WAIT FOR THE FINAL VERSION TO RELEASE.

WELCOME is a hardcore survival game that will be in a newer version with a bit of battleroyale style,
where the task of the players is to survive on the map and wisely use sprint for stamina.
Search for things to survive like food and drink, craft trees, stones and shrubs to extract the necessary resources to build a base where he can store a loot, improve things and make other useful items,
to find the weapons he will defend, and if he survives long enough, win the DEADZONE in which all players will meet.
Because of the large map and many areas players will have to explore the entire map to know where it is.
The map contains army camps, towns, villages and the environment is very forested and partly naturally densified.
Poor food management can lead to starving, dehydration, or complete death of a character.

Take the map and win in DEADZONE
1126100.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
